skills.skill: UI Component Framework (Material UI, Prime NG, DevExpress)

duties_responsibilities.duty: Design client-side and server-side architecture including the UX/UI and documentation.
Code and/or create Application Programming Interfaces (APIs).
Collaborate with stakeholders to scope requested new features and analyze user needs to determine technical requirements.

Write consistent, clean, and maintainable code. Evaluate code to ensure that it is valid, properly structured, meets industry standards, and is compatible with various browsers, devices, or operating systems.
Mentor Junior developers and interns.
Identify opportunities within processes where the automation group can add value and recommend solutions.
Define standards and processes to assure code quality.
Attention to detail.
Test Driven Development, Design Driven Development, Cloud Native Development.
Proficiency in front-end technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript frameworks such as React, Angular, or Vue.js. Knowledge of responsive design and cross-browser compatibility is also important.

Proficient with Java SE 12+, must have hands-on experience with advanced Java concepts such as Generics, Reflection, Multithreading, Annotations, JPA, JMS, Functional Programming, Lambda, Java Stream API.
Experience with build tools such as Jenkin, Maven, and Gradle.
Excellent understanding of Material UI, Prime NG, or DevExpress Component.
Skilled in server-side programming languages Java and Node.js. Knowledge of frameworks like Spring Core, Spring MVC, Spring Boot building web applications and services.

Familiarity with database systems like MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, or Oracle is important for handling data storage and retrieval. Understanding database design principles and query optimization is beneficial.
Experience in building and consuming RESTful APIs. Knowledge of tools like Postman or Swagger for API testing and documentation is advantageous.
Proficiency in using Git or other version control systems is essential for collaborative development and code management.
Knowledge of software development methodologies like Agile or Scrum, as well as experience with software testing and debugging, is important.
Full stack developers should be able to identify and resolve technical issues efficiently and effectively.
Understanding how to implement secure authentication, authorization, and data protection measures is crucial for web application development.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field (Master's preferred)
